statements: SELECT * FROM rental_properties;
SELECT property_id, location, size, price FROM rental_properties WHERE size > 100;
SELECT property_id, location, amenities FROM rental_properties WHERE price < 1500;
SELECT * FROM rental_properties ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT location, size, price FROM rental_properties WHERE amenities @> ARRAY['pool']
SELECT * FROM rental_properties WHERE location='New York' AND price > 2000
SELECT property_id, location FROM rental_properties WHERE size > 1500 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM rental_properties WHERE amenities @> ARRAY['gym', 'pool'] OR amenities @> ARRAY['parking']
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price, MAX(size) AS max_size FROM rental_properties WHERE location != 'Los Angeles'
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_properties FROM rental_properties GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_properties DESC
SELECT * FROM rental_listings;
SELECT listing_id, location, price FROM rental_listings WHERE size > 100;
SELECT listing_id, amenities FROM rental_listings ORDER BY amenities ASC;
SELECT location, price FROM rental_listings WHERE price < 2000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT owner_id, name, property_id FROM property_owners WHERE contact LIKE '+1%';
SELECT listing_id, location, size, amenities, price FROM rental_listings WHERE size > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT listing_id, location, amenities FROM rental_listings WHERE location LIKE 'New York%'
SELECT * FROM rental_listings WHERE amenities LIKE '%pool%';
SELECT * FROM rental_listings WHERE size BETWEEN 50 AND 150 AND price < 2000 ORDER BY location ASC

SELECT property_owners.name, rental_listings.location, rental_listings.price FROM rental_listings JOIN property_owners ON rental_listings.listing_id = property_owners.property_id ORDER BY rental_listings.location, rental_listings.price DESC
SELECT * FROM rental_properties;
SELECT property_id, location, size FROM rental_properties ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, rating, review_text FROM property_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT location, amenities FROM rental_properties WHERE size > 200 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM property_images WHERE image_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM rental_properties WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, size FROM rental_properties WHERE size > 100 ORDER BY size ASC;
SELECT property_id, amenities FROM rental_properties WHERE amenities LIKE '%pool%' ORDER BY property_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY property_id ASC, rating DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text FROM property_reviews WHERE review_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY reviewer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM rental_properties;
SELECT location, size, price FROM rental_properties;
SELECT id, location, amenities FROM rental_properties ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_types WHERE type_name = 'Apartment';
SELECT property_id, tenant_name, start_date, end_date FROM rental_contracts WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, size, price FROM rental_properties WHERE size > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT location, amenities, price FROM rental_properties WHERE price < 1500 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM property_types WHERE id = 3;
SELECT tenant_name, start_date, end_date FROM rental_contracts WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT location, size, amenities, price FROM rental_properties WHERE amenities LIKE '%pool%' AND price < 2000 ORDER BY location ASC, size DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_listings;
SELECT id, location, size FROM property_listings WHERE price < 500000;
SELECT amenities, location FROM property_listings WHERE size > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM agents WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT agent_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE property_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM property_listings WHERE size > 100 AND price < 500000 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT location, amenities FROM property_listings WHERE amenities LIKE '%pool%' ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, name, phone_number, email FROM agents WHERE name LIKE 'A%' OR email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY id
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, property_id FROM ratings GROUP BY property_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3.5 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC
SELECT p.id, p.location, a.name AS agent_name FROM property_listings p LEFT JOIN appointments ap ON p.id = ap.property_id LEFT JOIN agents a ON ap.agent_id = a.id ORDER BY p.location, agent_name ASC
